alert.note: Alert for Muskingum (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 7:01PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL MUSKINGUM COUNTY THROUGH 730 PM EDT... At 701 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Zanesville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Zanesville, New Concord, South Zanesville, North Zanesville, Philo, Pleasant Grove, Norwich, Bridgeville, Duncan Falls, Otsego, Drake, and Chandlersville. This includes Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 151 and 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
